attributes.action: Strip David Beckham of his OBE
attributes.background: In the media we have seen what David Beckham thinks of the public, he is self obsessed and just wants a knighthood. He no longer deserves his OBE and I think he should have it removed. We should no longer reward such behaviour, we have far more worthy people in our society who deserve such praise

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
